function PlayerStatistics(props) { const playerStat = props.data console.log(playerStat) return(
{playerStat?.leagueName}
{playerStat?.topStats?.items.map((stat, index) => (
{stat?.title === "Rating" ?
{stat?.statValue}
:
{stat?.statValue}
}
{stat?.title}
))}
) } export default PlayerStatistics
